definitions.definition: The monetary unit of Brazil from 1986 to 1990.
An old monetary unit of Portugal in the 17th and 18th centuries.
An old monetary unit of Castile in the 14th century.

main_definition: The monetary unit of Brazil from 1986 to 1990.
secondary_definitions: An old monetary unit of Portugal in the 17th and 18th centuries.
An old monetary unit of Castile in the 14th century.
